Package edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre

Class UniverseBuilder

java.lang.Object
edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.UniverseBuilder
public class UniverseBuilder extends Object
A universe builder assists in defining the types and entities of a universe by enforcing requirements on their definitions.
Author:
Stephen G. Ware

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    UniverseBuilder()
    Constructs a universe builder for a new, empty universe, which will contains only the pre-defined types that all universes contain and no entities.
    UniverseBuilder(Universe universe)
    Constructs a new universe builder that will begin with all the types and entities in the given universe and can be used to define a new universe that is an extension or modification of that universe.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Entity
    addEntityType(String entity, String type)
    Defines an entity to be of the given type.
    Type
    addTypeRelationship(String child, String parent)
    Makes one type a subtype of the other, creating the types if they do not already exist.
    Entity
    defineEntity(String name)
    Defines a new type with the given name, which will have entity as its only type, unless an entity with this name already exists, in which case that entity will be returned.
    Type
    defineType(String name)
    Defines a new type with the given name, which will have entity as its parent type, unless a type with this name already exists, in which case that type will be returned.
    Universe
    getUniverse()
    Returns the currently defined universe.
    Entity
    setEntityComment(String entity, String comment)
    Sets the comment associated with the given entity.
    Type
    setTypeComment(String type, String comment)
    Sets the comment associated with the given type.

    • UniverseBuilder

      public UniverseBuilder(Universe universe)
      Constructs a new universe builder that will begin with all the types and entities in the given universe and can be used to define a new universe that is an extension or modification of that universe.
      Parameters:
      universe - the pre-defined universe

    • UniverseBuilder

      public UniverseBuilder()
      Constructs a universe builder for a new, empty universe, which will contains only the pre-defined types that all universes contain and no entities.

  • Method Details

    • getUniverse

      public Universe getUniverse()
      Returns the currently defined universe.
      Returns:
      the universe

    • defineType

      public Type defineType(String name)
      Defines a new type with the given name, which will have entity as its parent type, unless a type with this name already exists, in which case that type will be returned.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the new type
      Returns:
      the new (or existing) type

    • addTypeRelationship

      public Type addTypeRelationship(String child, String parent)
      Makes one type a subtype of the other, creating the types if they do not already exist.
      Parameters:
      child - the name of the subtype (child) type
      parent - the name of the supertype (parent) type
      Returns:
      the modified child type
      Throws:
      FormatException - if either type is boolean or number, since these types cannot be subtype or supertypes of other types
      FormatException - if this could create a cycle in the type ontology

    • setTypeComment

      public Type setTypeComment(String type, String comment)
      Sets the comment associated with the given type.
      Parameters:
      type - the name of the type
      comment - the comment
      Returns:
      the modified type

    • defineEntity

      public Entity defineEntity(String name)
      Defines a new type with the given name, which will have entity as its only type, unless an entity with this name already exists, in which case that entity will be returned.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the new entity
      Returns:
      the new (or existing) entity

    • addEntityType

      public Entity addEntityType(String entity, String type)
      Defines an entity to be of the given type.
      Parameters:
      entity - the name of the entity
      type - the name of the type
      Returns:
      the modified entity
      Throws:
      FormatException - if the type is boolean or number

    • setEntityComment

      public Entity setEntityComment(String entity, String comment)
      Sets the comment associated with the given entity.
      Parameters:
      entity - the name of the entity
      comment - the comment
      Returns:
      the modified entity
